```{r, echo = FALSE, results = "hide"}
freq <- signif(runif(1, 0.1, 100), 3) # Hz
  
ans <- signif(1 / freq, 3) # freq (Hz)

sc <- num_to_schoice(ans, delta = ans/10, format = FALSE, digits = 6)
sc$questions <- sprintf("$%g \\,\\mathsf{s}$", signif(sc$questions, 3))
```
Question
========
A wave has a frequency of $`r freq` \,\mathsf{Hz}$. What is its period?

```{r, echo = FALSE, results = "asis"}
answerlist(sc$questions, markup = "markdown")
```

Solution
========
Period is the reciprocal of the frequency Therefore,

$$ T = \frac{1}{f} = \frac{1}{`r freq` \,\mathsf{Hz}} = `r ans` \,\mathsf{s} $$
